total_revenue.context: Revenue up 1% year-over-year despite COVID-19 impact

segments.name: iPhone
key_points: Strong first five weeks of quarter
COVID-19 impact in China for next five weeks
Global impact in last three weeks
Channel inventory reduced more than previous year
Slight elongation in replacement cycle due to store closures

segments.name: Services
key_points: Record revenue for App Store, Apple Music, Video, Cloud Services
Record in App Store search ad business
Highest sequential growth in paid subscriptions ever (35+ million)
Strong performance across all geographic segments

segments.name: Mac

revenue.context: Revenue impacted by COVID-19 and supply constraints

key_points: Half of customers new to Mac

segments.name: iPad
key_points: New iPad Pro launched with LiDAR scanner
Half of customers new to iPad

segments.name: Wearables, Home and Accessories
key_points: Strong double-digit growth in all geographic segments
75% of Apple Watch buyers were first-time purchasers

gross_margin.context: Flat sequentially with cost savings and Services mix shift

products_gross_margin.context: Down 380 basis points sequentially due to COVID-19 impact

services_gross_margin.context: Up 100 basis points sequentially due to favorable mix

cash_flow.context: Operating cash flow up $2.2 billion year-over-year

tax_rate.context: Below 16.5% guidance due to discrete items

supply_chain.position: Typical supply position including new product ramps

product_trends.iphone_wearables: Expected year-over-year performance to worsen in June quarter
product_trends.ipad_mac: Expected year-over-year performance to improve in June quarter

positive_trends: Strong engagement in App Store, Video, Music, and cloud services
Expected to continue through June quarter

headwinds: Foreign exchange impact of 70 basis points sequentially

quarter_phases.first_five_weeks: Very strong performance, tracking toward record quarter
quarter_phases.next_five_weeks: COVID-19 impact on iPhone supply and China demand
quarter_phases.last_three_weeks: Global impact from lockdowns and store closures

products.context: Impacted by COVID-19 in last three weeks

cfo_detailed_commentary.channel_inventory: iPhone channel inventory reduced more than previous year
cfo_detailed_commentary.installed_base: All-time high across all geographic segments and product categories

remote_work: Quick pivot for large customers like IBM and SAP

key_sectors.grocery: Apple Pay adoption for contactless payments
key_sectors.banking: Large iOS device deployments for remote work
